== MainInclusionReportToshset ==

== Main inclusion report for Toshset ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/t/toshset

2. ''Rationale:'' This package is required in order to enable/disable Bluetooth on modern Toshiba laptops

3. ''Security:'' No known security issues

4. ''QA:'' Command line tool that requires no configuration. By default, will only be used by ACPI scripts for enabling/disabling the Bluetooth hardware in Toshiba machines.

5. ''Standards compliance:'' Debhelpered package, appears to meet FHS and policy (no linda/lintian issues) 

6. ''Dependencies:'' None
